You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you on your adventure and obeys any simple commands you give it to the best of your abilities.

When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hunt Prey], your animal companion gains the action's benefits and your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Hunter's Edge] benefit if you have one.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision]
